definition.en:
Represents a short written work typically less than a single paragraph in length.
see [https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-note](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-note)
definition.de:
Stellt eine kurze schriftliche Arbeit dar, die in der Regel weniger als einen Absatz lang ist.
siehe [https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-note](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-note)
definition.fr:
Représente un court travail écrit, généralement d'une longueur inférieure à un paragraphe.
voir [https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-note](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-note)
definition.es:
Representa un trabajo escrito breve, normalmente de menos de un párrafo.
ver [https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-note](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-note)

example.en:
[Example 53](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#ex52-jsonld)

 ```json 
{
  "@context": "https://www.w3.org/ns/activitystreams",
  "type": "Note",
  "name": "A Word of Warning",
  "content": "Looks like it is going to rain today. Bring an umbrella!"
}
```
